data.actual_result: It starts to work incorrectly and flicker a little
data.expected_result: It still works as intended like the first click
data.short_description: Clicking the copy button for invites twice quickly and then clicking it again makes it flicker and and not work properly anymore
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the invite friends modal - Click the copy button for the invite once and observe it - Now click it again and when it says "Copied" click it again - Click it again and see what happens
